Uses of Class
controller.ObjectController

  • Packages that use ObjectController 
    Package Description
    collider
    Package containing the main Collider class and its subclasses.
    controller
    The controller package contains Object controllers that govern an objects behavior, without being involved in its collision or drawing properties.
    gameobjects
    This package contains the class GameObject and some subclasses defined for convenience and ease of use.
